name: WATCH THE MONITOR
description:
A challenging and engaging game, with a minimalist stile. 

In order to win, the player must survive all 5 nights without dying.

The player has to close the entrances when needed and, at the same time, checking the power remaining and the temperature, don't underestimate them, even them may cause your death.

Basically this game creates a stressful environment, where the player has to check constantly different values and possible threats.

We accept any kind of criticism, so don't hold back!

-The Developers
